= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Type* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| *BMA.MM.PT.PTA* || Anterior Pretectum Nucleus || Sensory Relay Nucleus || Mediate somatosensory and nociceptive information || 3 parallel flows from MC, anterior interpositus nucleus of TH, GR to dorsal accessory IO ||
|| *BMA.HP.PVR* || Parvocellular Reticular Nucleus || Premotor Nucleus || Flow of respiratory current out of organism || Projects to facial nucleus, hypoglossal nucleus and parabrachial nucleus ||
|| *BMA.HP.PB* || Parabrachial Nucleus || Sensory Relay Nucleus || Source of short-latency nociceptive input || ||
|| *BMA.HP.VB* || Vestibular Nucleus || Premotor Nucleus || Equilibrium, Postural Reflexes || Pons ||
|| *BMA.HM.IO* || Inferior Olivary Nucleus || Sensory Relay Nucleus || Proprioception Relay from Spinal Cord to Cerebellum || ||
|| *BMA.HM.CU* || Cuneate Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Carry fine touch and proprioceptive information from upper body || ||
|| *BMA.HM.GR* || Gracile Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Carry epicritic, kinesthetic, and conscious proprioceptive information from lower body || ||
|| *BMA.HM.ARC* || Medullary Arcuate Nucleus || Sensory Relay Nucleus || Controlling respiratory frequency || Receives fibers from spitothalamic tract and sends to CR ||
|| *BMA.SC.MG* || Marginal Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Relay information related to pain and temperature sensation || Pain sensation cannot be modulated ||
|| *BMA.SC.SG* || Substantia Gelatinosa || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Relay for C-fibers of slowly conducting, poorly localized pain sensation || Second of two after proprius 1-order neurons ||
|| *BMA.SC.NP* || Proprius Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Relay light touch, pain and temperature information || With Clarke's Nucleus sensing fine touch and proprioception ||
|| *BMA.SC.LCV* || Lateral Cervical Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Relay Low-threshold Mechanoreceptors to CR || from Lamina V ||
|| *BMA.SC.LSN* || Lateral Spinal Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Integrate autonomic and homeostatic functions || Projects to HT and lateral globus pallidus ||
|| *BMA.SC.CCV* || Central Cervical Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Coordinate voluntary movements, maintain balance, and learn motor skills || Receive neck and vestibular input and project to CR and vestibular nuclei ||
|| *BMA.SC.SPCR* || Sacral Precerebellar Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Relay unconscious proprioception, motor feedback to CR || Lower extremity and trunk, relay motor feedback to CR ||
|| *BMA.SC.CBS* || Centrobasalis Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Unconscious proprioception to CR || Upper extremity, relay motor feedback to CR, <BR>major site of termination for dorsal root fibers ||
|| *BMA.SC.RPL* || Retroposteriolateral Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Innervation of limbs muscles || ||
|| *BMA.SC.PM* || Posteromedial Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Innervation of trunk muscles || Upper and lower ||
|| *BMA.SC.MM* || Medial Motor Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Innervation of trunk muscles || Upper and lower ||
|| *BMA.SC.PL* || Posterolateral Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Innervation of limb muscles || Upper and lower ||
|| *SCA.SC.LM* || Lateral Motor Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Innervation of limb muscles || Upper and lower ||
|| *SCA.SC.PHR* || Phrenic Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Innervation of diaphragm || Projections from Nucleus Solitarius ||
